verses.verse: ( Jesus Appears by the Sea of Tiberias) Μετὰ <WG3326> Meta Later ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta . . . , ἐφανέρωσεν <WG5319> ephanerōsen revealed ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton Himself πάλιν <WG3825> palin again ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus τοῖς <WG3588> tois to the μαθηταῖς <WG3101> mathētais disciples . ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi by τῆς <WG3588> tēs the θαλάσσης <WG2281> thalassēs Sea τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Τιβεριάδος <WG5085> Tiberiados of Tiberias , ( That is, the Sea of Galilee) ἐφανέρωσεν <WG5319> ephanerōsen He made [Himself] known δὲ <WG1161> de - οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs in this way :

ἦσαν <WG1510> ēsan were ὁμοῦ <WG3674> homou together . Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn Simon Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Θωμᾶς <WG2381> Thōmas Thomas ὁ <WG3588> ho - λεγόμενος <WG3004> legomenos called Δίδυμος <WG1324> Didymos Didymus , ( Didymus means the twin.) καὶ <WG2532> kai - Ναθαναὴλ <WG3482> Nathanaēl Nathanael ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Κανᾶ <WG2580> Kana Cana τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Γαλιλαίας <WG1056> Galilaias in Galilee , καὶ <WG2532> kai - οἱ <WG3588> hoi the [sons] τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Ζεβεδαίου <WG2199> Zebedaiou of Zebedee , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi other ἐκ <WG1537> ek - τῶν <WG3588> tōn - μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou - δύο <WG1417> dyo two

λέγει <WG3004> legei told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn Simon Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter Ὑπάγω <WG5217> Hypagō “ I am going ἁλιεύειν <WG232> halieuein fishing . ” Λέγουσιν <WG3004> Legousin they said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Ἐρχόμεθα <WG2064> Erchometha will go καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis “ We σὺν <WG4862> syn with σοί <WG4771> soi you , ” ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon [So] they went out καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐνέβησαν <WG1684> enebēsan got εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the πλοῖον <WG4143> ploion boat , καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] ἐν <WG1722> en - ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē that τῇ <WG3588> tē - νυκτὶ <WG3571> nykti night . ἐπίασαν <WG4084> epiasan caught οὐδέν <WG3762> ouden nothing

Πρωΐας <WG4405> Prōias Early in the morning δὲ <WG1161> de - ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē . . . γενομένης* <WG1096> genomenēs . . . , ἔστη <WG2476> estē stood Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὸν <WG3588> ton the αἰγιαλόν <WG123> aigialon shore , οὐ <WG3756> ou did not μέντοι <WG3305> mentoi but ᾔδεισαν <WG1492> ēdeisan recognize οἱ <WG3588> hoi the μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin it was

λέγει <WG3004> legei called out οὖν <WG3767> oun So αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous [He] Παιδία <WG3813> Paidia “ Children , μή <WG3361> mē vvv τι <WG5100> ti any προσφάγιον <WG4371> prosphagion fish ? ” ἔχετε <WG2192> echete do you have Ἀπεκρίθησαν <WG611> Apekrithēsan they answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Οὔ <WG3756> Ou “ No , ”

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Βάλετε <WG906> Balete “ Cast εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὰ <WG3588> ta the δεξιὰ <WG1188> dexia right μέρη <WG3313> merē side τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the πλοίου <WG4143> ploiou boat , τὸ <WG3588> to the δίκτυον <WG1350> diktyon net καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὑρήσετε <WG2147> heurēsete you will find [some] . ” ἔβαλον <WG906> ebalon they cast [it there] , οὖν <WG3767> oun So καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi vvv αὐτὸ <WG846> auto . . . ἑλκύσαι <WG1670> helkysai to haul it in ἴσχυον <WG2480> ischyon they were unable ἀπὸ <WG575> apo because of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the πλήθους <WG4128> plēthous great number τῶν <WG3588> tōn of ἰχθύων <WG2486> ichthyōn fish .

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said οὖν <WG3767> oun Then ὁ <WG3588> ho - μαθητὴς <WG3101> mathētēs disciple ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos [the] ὃν <WG3739> hon whom ἠγάπα <WG25> ēgapa loved ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus τῷ <WG3588> tō - Πέτρῳ <WG4074> Petrō to Peter , Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the Κύριός <WG2962> Kyrios Lord ! ” ἐστιν <WG1510> estin “ It is Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn Simon οὖν <WG3767> oun As soon as Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter ἀκούσας <WG191> akousas heard ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ὁ <WG3588> ho the Κύριός <WG2962> Kyrios Lord , ἐστιν <WG1510> estin it was τὸν <WG3588> ton [his] ἐπενδύτην <WG1903> ependytēn outer garment διεζώσατο <WG1241> diezōsato he put on ἦν <WG1510> ēn he had removed it γὰρ <WG1063> gar (for γυμνός <WG1131> gymnos . . . ) καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔβαλεν <WG906> ebalen jumped ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton . . . εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea .

οἱ <WG3588> hoi The δὲ <WG1161> de - ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi other μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples τῷ <WG3588> tō in the πλοιαρίῳ <WG4142> ploiariō boat . ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon came [ashore] οὐ <WG3756> ou not γὰρ <WG1063> gar for ἦσαν <WG1510> ēsan they were μακρὰν <WG3112> makran far ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῆς <WG3588> tēs - γῆς <WG1093> gēs land , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla only ὡς <WG5613> hōs about ἀπὸ <WG575> apo . . . . ( Greek about two hundred cubits away; that is, approximately 300 feet or 91 meters) πηχῶν <WG4083> pēchōn . . . διακοσίων <WG1250> diakosiōn a hundred yards σύροντες <WG4951> syrontes They dragged in τὸ <WG3588> to the δίκτυον <WG1350> diktyon net τῶν <WG3588> tōn full of ἰχθύων <WG2486> ichthyōn fish ,

Ὡς <WG5613> Hōs When οὖν <WG3767> oun - ἀπέβησαν <WG576> apebēsan they landed εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn . . . γῆν <WG1093> gēn . . . , βλέπουσιν <WG991> blepousin they saw ἀνθρακιὰν <WG439> anthrakian a charcoal fire κειμένην <WG2749> keimenēn there καὶ <WG2532> kai [with] ὀψάριον <WG3795> opsarion fish ἐπικείμενον <WG1945> epikeimenon on it , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἄρτον <WG740> arton [some] bread .

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Ἐνέγκατε <WG5342> Enenkate “ Bring ἀπὸ <WG575> apo [some] of τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ὀψαρίων <WG3795> opsariōn fish ὧν <WG3739> hōn - ἐπιάσατε <WG4084> epiasate you have just caught . ” νῦν <WG3568> nyn vvv

ἀνέβη <WG305> anebē went aboard ‹οὖν› <WG3767> oun So Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn Simon Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἵλκυσεν <WG1670> heilkysen dragged τὸ <WG3588> to the δίκτυον <WG1350> diktyon net εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τὴν <WG3588> tēn vvv γῆν <WG1093> gēn ashore . μεστὸν <WG3324> meston [It was] full ἰχθύων <WG2486> ichthyōn fish , μεγάλων <WG3173> megalōn of large ἑκατὸν <WG1540> hekaton 153 πεντήκοντα <WG4004> pentēkonta . . . τριῶν <WG5140> triōn . . . , καὶ <WG2532> kai but even τοσούτων <WG5118> tosoutōn so many , ὄντων <WG1510> ontōn with οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐσχίσθη <WG4977> eschisthē was not torn . τὸ <WG3588> to the δίκτυον <WG1350> diktyon net

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Δεῦτε <WG1205> Deute “ Come , ἀριστήσατε <WG709> aristēsate have breakfast , ” οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis None ‹δὲ› <WG1161> de - ἐτόλμα <WG5111> etolma dared τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples ἐξετάσαι <WG1833> exetasai to ask αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , Σὺ <WG4771> Sy You ? ” τίς <WG5101> tis “ Who εἶ <WG1510> ei are εἰδότες <WG1492> eidotes They knew ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ὁ <WG3588> ho the Κύριός <WG2962> Kyrios Lord . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin it was

ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai came ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai and λαμβάνει <WG2983> lambanei took τὸν <WG3588> ton the ἄρτον <WG740> arton bread καὶ <WG2532> kai and δίδωσιν <WG1325> didōsin gave [it] αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸ <WG3588> to the ὀψάριον <WG3795> opsarion fish . ὁμοίως <WG3668> homoiōs [He did] the same with

Τοῦτο <WG3778> Touto This [was] ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē now τρίτον <WG5154> triton the third time [that] ἐφανερώθη <WG5319> ephanerōthē appeared ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho to Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus τοῖς <WG3588> tois the μαθηταῖς <WG3101> mathētais disciples ἐγερθεὶς <WG1453> egertheis after He was raised ἐκ <WG1537> ek from νεκρῶν <WG3498> nekrōn [the] dead .

Ὅτε <WG3753> Hote When ( Jesus and Peter) οὖν <WG3767> oun vvv ἠρίστησαν <WG709> ēristēsan they had finished eating , λέγει <WG3004> legei asked τῷ <WG3588> tō - Σίμωνι <WG4613> Simōni Simon Πέτρῳ <WG4074> Petrō Peter , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn “ Simon Ἰωάννου <WG2491> Iōannou [son] of John , ἀγαπᾷς <WG25> agapas do you love με <WG1473> me Me πλέον <WG4119> pleon more τούτων <WG3778> toutōn than these ? ” Λέγει <WG3004> Legei he answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ναί <WG3483> Nai “ Yes , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie Lord , ” σὺ <WG4771> sy “ You οἶδας <WG1492> oidas know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - φιλῶ <WG5368> philō I love σε <WG4771> se You . ” Λέγει <WG3004> Legei [Jesus] replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Βόσκε <WG1006> Boske “ Feed τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἀρνία <WG721> arnia lambs . ” μου <WG1473> mou My

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei [Jesus] asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - πάλιν <WG3825> palin vvv δεύτερον <WG1208> deuteron a second time , Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn “ Simon Ἰωάννου <WG2491> Iōannou [son] of John , ἀγαπᾷς <WG25> agapas do you love με <WG1473> me Me ? ” Λέγει <WG3004> Legei he answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ναί <WG3483> Nai “ Yes , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie Lord , ” σὺ <WG4771> sy “ You οἶδας <WG1492> oidas know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - φιλῶ <WG5368> philō I love σε <WG4771> se You . ” Λέγει <WG3004> Legei [Jesus] told αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him , Ποίμαινε <WG4165> Poimaine “ Shepherd τὰ <WG3588> ta - πρόβατά <WG4263> probata sheep . ” μου <WG1473> mou My

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei [Jesus] asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - τὸ <WG3588> to a τρίτον <WG5154> triton third time , Σίμων <WG4613> Simōn “ Simon Ἰωάννου <WG2491> Iōannou [son] of John , φιλεῖς <WG5368> phileis do you love με <WG1473> me Me ? ” Ἐλυπήθη <WG3076> Elypēthē was deeply hurt ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [Jesus] had asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him τὸ <WG3588> to - τρίτον <WG5154> triton a third time , Φιλεῖς <WG5368> Phileis “ Do you love με <WG1473> me Me ? ” Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen he replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , πάντα <WG3956> panta all things , ” σὺ <WG4771> sy You οἶδας <WG1492> oidas know σὺ <WG4771> sy “ You γινώσκεις <WG1097> ginōskeis know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - φιλῶ <WG5368> philō I love σε <WG4771> se You . ” Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to him , ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Βόσκε <WG1006> Boske “ Feed τὰ <WG3588> ta - πρόβατά <WG4263> probata sheep . μου <WG1473> mou My

Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell σοι <WG4771> soi you , ὅτε <WG3753> hote when ἦς <WG1510> ēs you were νεώτερος <WG3501> neōteros young , ἐζώννυες <WG2224> ezōnnyes you dressed σεαυτὸν <WG4572> seauton yourself καὶ <WG2532> kai and περιεπάτεις <WG4043> periepateis walked ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where ἤθελες <WG2309> ētheles you wanted ; ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when δὲ <WG1161> de but γηράσῃς <WG1095> gērasēs you are old , ἐκτενεῖς <WG1614> ekteneis you will stretch out τὰς <WG3588> tas - χεῖράς <WG5495> cheiras hands , σου <WG4771> sou your καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἄλλος <WG243> allos someone else ( Or others) ζώσει <WG2224> zōsei will dress σε <WG4771> se you καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἴσει <WG5342> oisei lead [you] ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θέλεις <WG2309> theleis you do not want to go . ”

τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [Jesus] said σημαίνων <WG4591> sēmainōn to indicate ποίῳ <WG4169> poiō by which θανάτῳ <WG2288> thanatō [the kind of] death δοξάσει <WG1392> doxasei [Peter] would glorify τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God . Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And [after] τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this , εἰπὼν <WG2036> eipōn He had said λέγει <WG3004> legei He told αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him , Ἀκολούθει <WG190> Akolouthei “ Follow μοι <WG1473> moi Me . ”

Ἐπιστραφεὶς <WG1994> Epistrapheis turned ( Jesus and the Beloved Disciple) ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter βλέπει <WG991> blepei [and] saw τὸν <WG3588> ton the μαθητὴν <WG3101> mathētēn disciple ὃν <WG3739> hon whom ἠγάπα <WG25> ēgapa loved ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ἀκολουθοῦντα <WG190> akolouthounta following [them] . ὃς <WG3739> hos who καὶ <WG2532> kai [He was the one] ἀνέπεσεν <WG377> anepesen had leaned back ἐν <WG1722> en at τῷ <WG3588> tō the δείπνῳ <WG1173> deipnō supper ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi vvv τὸ <WG3588> to vvv στῆθος <WG4738> stēthos [against Jesus] ( Greek reclined on His bosom) αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou vvv καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen to ask , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , τίς <WG5101> tis who ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is going to ὁ <WG3588> ho . . . παραδιδούς <WG3860> paradidous betray σε <WG4771> se You ? ”

τοῦτον <WG3778> touton him , οὖν <WG3767> oun [When] ἰδὼν <WG3708> idōn [Peter] saw ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros [he] λέγει <WG3004> legei asked τῷ <WG3588> tō . . . Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou . . . , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , οὗτος <WG3778> houtos [him] ? ” δὲ <WG1161> de - τί <WG5101> ti what about

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean “ If αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him θέλω <WG2309> thelō I want μένειν <WG3306> menein to remain ἕως <WG2193> heōs until ἔρχομαι <WG2064> erchomai I return , τί <WG5101> ti what [is that] πρὸς <WG4314> pros to σέ <WG4771> se you ? σύ <WG4771> sy You μοι <WG1473> moi Me ! ” ἀκολούθει <WG190> akolouthei follow
